Title: Prohibits the use of investment managers to assist with investments of monies in the common retirement fund
Summary: Prohibits the use of investment managers to assist with investments of monies in the common retirement fund; requires that all current contracts with investment managers not be renewed after a period of one year.
LawCode: Amd ยง424-a, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to prohibiting investing in the common retirement fund using investment managers
